author: National Geographic
description:
Experience the official soundtrack of Nkashi: Race for the Okavango through an immersive film paired with sweeping visuals of Botswana’s landscapes and the Okavango Delta. Featuring stunning footage from the documentary, the film captures the region’s wildlife, culture, and fragile environment. This film and music video offers a contemplative journey through one of the world’s most extraordinary and sensitive ecosystems.

Watch the full documentary, Nkashi: Race for the Okavango, here: https://youtu.be/yum0xq2gmzc

title: Ambient Music & Scenery of the Okavango Delta | Nkashi: Race for the Okavango | National Geographic

author: National Geographic
description:
Go behind the scenes with the talented composers and musicians who created the award-winning original score for the documentary, Nkashi: Race for the Okavango. Produced by the National Geographic Society's Impact Story Lab and Batswana filmmakers, The Music of Nkashi follows artists from Botswana, across Africa, and around the world as they gather in the Okavango Delta to create original music tracks for the powerful film. The resulting score, winner of the Jackson Wild Award for Original Music Score, is authentic to the Okavango Delta region and celebrates the culture and collaboration in Africa.

Watch the full documentary, Nkashi: Race for the Okavango, here: https://youtu.be/yum0xq2gmzc
